code: import axios from'axios';import{GET_TICKETS,ADD_TICKET,UPDATE_TICKET,TICKETS_LOADING}from'./types';import{returnErrors}from'./errorActions';export var getTickets=function getTickets(term,name){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setItemsLoading());axios.get('/api/tickets',{params:{term:term,name:name}}).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_TICKETS,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch(returnErrors(err.response.data,err.response.status));});};};export var newTicket=function newTicket(ticket){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/api/tickets/create',ticket).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:ADD_TICKET});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch(returnErrors(err.response.data,err.response.status));});};};export var updateTicket=function updateTicket(id,data){return function(dispatch){axios.put("/api/tickets/".concat(id),data).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:UPDATE_TICKET});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch(returnErrors(err.response.data,err.response.status));});};};export var setItemsLoading=function setItemsLoading(){return{type:TICKETS_LOADING};};
